mapper.insert: insert into board(userId, subject, content) values(#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(COUNT(*), 0) FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId

select num, b.userId, subject, userName, content, DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created, hitCount from board b Join member m ON b.userId = m.userId
ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
SELECT num, b.userId, subject, content, userName,DATE_FORMAT(created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created,hitCount FROM board b JOIN member m ON b.userId = m.userId WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num FROM board
AND (num < #{num})
ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT num FROM board
AND (num > #{num})
ORDER BY num ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bbsreply(num, userId, content, answer) VALUES (#{num},#{userId},#{content}, #{answer})
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(COUNT(*), 0) FROM bbsreply b where num=#{num} and answer=0

select replyNum, r.num, r.userId, userName, content, answer, DATE_FORMAT(r.created, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created,imageFilename from bbsreply r Join member m ON r.userId = m.userId Join photo p ON r.userId = p.userId where r.num=#{num} and answer=0 ORDER BY replyNum DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
